channel.title: RSS Aggregator Feed
channel.description: An aggregated feed of Technology-related news

item.title: Nvidia acquires AI chip challenger Groq for $20B, report says
item.description: With Groq on its side, Nvidia is poised to become even more dominant in chip manufacturing.

item.title: Get this capable RX 9060XT iBuyPower PC for less than $1000 — there's even 32GB DDR5 RAM and a Ryzen 7 9700X CPU, the fastest processor in its category
item.description: This iBuyPower desktop PC with Ryzen 7 speed and RX 9060 XT power is just $999 at Best Buy

item.title: Why brands need to stop treating sound as a backing track
item.description: Visuals matter, but audio can drive a high ROI and brand lift. The biggest brands pour creativity into being instantly recognizable. A logo you can spot at 20 paces. A color palette that becomes cultural shorthand (think Oreo blue or Coca-Cola red).

item.title: Elon Musk Reportedly Insisted on Troubled Tesla Doors After a Warning
item.description: Tesla's door worries are not going away.

item.title: 20 Years on, ‘The Christmas Invasion’ Is Still the Best ‘Doctor Who’ Christmas Special
item.description: As one of the most beloved traditions of contemporary 'Doctor Who' turns 20, we look back on why the special that started it all is still the gold standard.

item.title: Can teacher wisdom steer the AI transition in education?
item.description: The DonorsChoose CEO shares why educational AI must stay focused on the students. Artificial intelligence is fundamentally reshaping countless industries; education is no exception. As AI tools rapidly enter classrooms, there are concerns about fair access, effective implementation, and the risk of widening the still persistent digital divide. Who are the players best positioned to guide this transition in a way that truly benefits every student?...

item.title: Content creators, take note: The DJI Mic Mini is over half off at Amazon
item.description: The DJI Mic Mini is on sale at Amazon for $79, down from the list price of $169. That's a 53% discount.

item.title: Keep an eye on deliveries for under $30 with this record-low Blink doorbell deal
item.description: As of Dec. 24, you can get the Blink Video Doorbell system (with Sync Module) for just $29.99, down from $69.99, at Amazon.

item.title: Waymo and Santa Monica Will Go To Court Over Public Nuisance Allegations
item.description: Residents claim that the vehicles' shrieking noises keep them awake.

item.title: Treat yourself: The Bose QuietComfort Ultra headphones just hit a new best price ever
item.description: The Bose QuietComfort Ultra headphones are on sale for their best price ever of $269.99 at Amazon in the limited-edition plum shade.

item.title: For Jujutsu Kaisen fans, Christmas Eve is a day of mourning
item.description: Two very significant characters on 'Jujutsu Kaisen' said goodbye on this usually joyful day.
